synopsis.text: Her name is synonymous with captivating manga, but before Hiromu Arakawa graced the world with her illustrations, she was a dedicated farmer in Hokkaido, Japan's agricultural powerhouse. For seven grueling yet fulfilling years, she tilled the earth, nurtured crops, and milked cows, all while fending off pesky wildlife. Now, Arakawa invites readers to embark on a journey into her past, revealing the trials and triumphs of farm life. Through her unique blend of humor and heart, she paints a vivid picture of the relentless work and boundless rewards that come with being a farmer. So, join the creator of Fullmetal Alchemist as she shares her personal experiences, pays homage to her roots, and unveils the hidden joys of life on the farm.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
